hibernate-mapping.query: select dvh.Id from ClientDataVersionHeader as dvh where dvh.ClientDataVersionNo = :versionNo and dvh.Active = true
select new cendto07( dvh.Id, dvh.ClientDataVersionNo) from ClientDataVersionHeader as dvh where dvh.ReleaseDate > :today and dvh.Active = true
select new cendto07( dvh.VersionDescription, dvh.ReleaseDate, dvh.TS) from ClientDataVersionHeader as dvh where dvh.Id = :id and dvh.Active = true
update ClientDataVersionHeader dvh set dvh.Active = :isActive, dvh.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, dvh.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where dvh.Id = :id and dvh.TS = :ts and dvh.Active = true

select new cendto07( dvh.Id, dvh.ClientDataVersionNo, dvh.VersionDescription, dvh.ReleaseDate, cu.UserName, dvh.CreatedDate, uu.UserName, dvh.UpdatedDate) from ClientDataVersionHeader as dvh inner join dvh.CreatedUser as cu with cu.Active = true left join dvh.UpdatedUser as uu with uu.Active = true where dvh.ReleaseDate between :fromdate and :todate and dvh.Active = true

select new ccomdto07( dvh.Id, dvh.ClientDataVersionNo, dvh.VersionDescription, dvh.ReleaseDate ) from ClientDataVersionHeader as dvh where dvh.ReleaseDate <=:today and dvh.Active = true order by dvh.ClientDataVersionNo desc
